Package com.epam.esm.giftCertificate

Class GiftCertificateController

java.lang.Object
com.epam.esm.controllers.GiftCertificateController
@RestController @RequestMapping(value="/certificate", produces="application/json") public class GiftCertificateController extends Object
Author:
orest uzhytchak A controller class for gift certificate

  • Constructor Details

    • GiftCertificateController

      @Autowired public GiftCertificateController(GiftCertificateService giftCertificateService)

  • Method Details

    • getAllGiftCertificates

      @GetMapping public List<GiftCertificate> getAllGiftCertificates(@RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="1") Integer page, @RequestParam(value="page-size",defaultValue="10") Integer pageSize)
      Controller GET method that return all got gift certificates, by calling a method of service layer
      Parameters:
      page - page number to be viewed (default value = 1)
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page (default value = 10)
      Returns:
      list of gift certificates got from service layer
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.getAllGiftCertificates(Integer, Integer)

    • getSortedGiftCertificates

      @GetMapping("sort") public List<GiftCertificate> getSortedGiftCertificates(@Nullable @RequestParam("name") String nameDirection, @Nullable @RequestParam("create-date") String createDateDirection, @Nullable @RequestParam("price") String priceDirection, @RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="1") Integer page, @RequestParam(value="page-size",defaultValue="10") Integer pageSize)
      Controller GET method that return sorted gift certificates, by calling a method of service layer. Method will sort by first parameter with sorting attribute.
      Parameters:
      nameDirection - asc or desc value for name sorting attribute
      createDateDirection - asc or desc value for create date sorting attribute
      priceDirection - asc or desc value for price sorting attribute
      page - page number to be viewed (default value = 1)
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page (default value = 10)
      Returns:
      list of sorted gift certificates got from service layer
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.getSortedGiftCertificates(String, String, Integer, Integer)

    • getSortedGiftCertificatesByNameAndCreateDate

      @GetMapping("double-sort") public List<GiftCertificate> getSortedGiftCertificatesByNameAndCreateDate(@RequestParam(value="name",defaultValue="asc") String nameDirection, @RequestParam(value="create-date",defaultValue="asc") String createDateDirection, @RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="1") Integer page, @RequestParam(value="page-size",defaultValue="10") Integer pageSize)
      Controller GET method that return sorted gift certificates, by calling a method of service layer. Method will sort by two parameter two parameters at once.
      Parameters:
      nameDirection - asc or desc value for name sorting attribute
      createDateDirection - asc or desc value for create date sorting attribute
      page - page number to be viewed (default value = 1)
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page (default value = 10)
      Returns:
      list of sorted gift certificates got from service layer
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.getSortedGiftCertificatesByNameAndCreateDate(String, String, Integer, Integer)

    • getGiftCertificatesByName

      @GetMapping("find-by-name") public List<GiftCertificate> getGiftCertificatesByName(@RequestParam(value="name",defaultValue="") String name, @RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="1") Integer page, @RequestParam(value="page-size",defaultValue="10") Integer pageSize)
      Controller GET method that return gift certificates by part of name, by calling a method of service layer.
      Parameters:
      name - name or part of name of gift certificate that we are going to find
      page - page number to be viewed (default value = 1)
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page (default value = 10)
      Returns:
      list of sorted gift certificates got by name from service layer
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.getGiftCertificatesByName(String, Integer, Integer)

    • getGiftCertificatesByDescription

      @GetMapping("find-by-description") public List<GiftCertificate> getGiftCertificatesByDescription(@RequestParam(value="description",defaultValue="") String description, @RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="1") Integer page, @RequestParam(value="page-size",defaultValue="10") Integer pageSize)
      Controller GET method that return gift certificates by part of description, by calling a method of service layer.
      Parameters:
      description - description or part of description of gift certificate that we are going to find
      page - page number to be viewed (default value = 1)
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page (default value = 10)
      Returns:
      list of gift certificates got by description from service layer
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.getGiftCertificatesByDescription(String, Integer, Integer)

    • getGiftCertificateBySeveralTags

      @GetMapping("find-by-several-tags/{tags}") public List<GiftCertificate> getGiftCertificateBySeveralTags(@PathVariable("tags") String[] tags, @RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="1") Integer page, @RequestParam(value="page-size",defaultValue="10") Integer pageSize)
      Controller GET method that return gift certificates by set of tags, by calling a method of service layer.
      Parameters:
      tags - set of tags of gift certificates that we are going to find
      page - page number to be viewed (default value = 1)
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page (default value = 10)
      Returns:
      list of gift certificates got by tags got from service layer
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.getGiftCertificateBySeveralTags(Set, Integer, Integer)

    • addNewGiftCertificate

      @PostMapping public GiftCertificate addNewGiftCertificate(@RequestBody GiftCertificate giftCertificate)
      Controller POST method that add a new gift certificate, by calling a method of service layer.
      Parameters:
      giftCertificate - object of Gift certificate that are going to be added in DB
      Returns:
      object that was added in DB
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.addNewGiftCertificate(GiftCertificate)

    • updateGiftCertificate

      @PatchMapping("{id}") public GiftCertificate updateGiftCertificate(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody GiftCertificate giftCertificate)
      Controller PATCH method that updating a gift certificate by id, by calling a method of service layer.
      Parameters:
      giftCertificate - object of Gift certificate that are going to be updated in DB
      id - an id of object that are going to be updated
      Returns:
      object that was updated in DB
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.updateGiftCertificate(Long, GiftCertificate)

    • updateGiftCertificateBySomeFields

      @PatchMapping("update-field/{id}") public GiftCertificate updateGiftCertificateBySomeFields(@PathVariable Long id, @Nullable @RequestParam("name") String name, @Nullable @RequestParam("description") String description, @Nullable @RequestParam("price") BigDecimal price, @Nullable @RequestParam("duration") Integer duration)
      Controller PATCH method that updating a gift certificate by id and also by some fields, by calling a method of service layer.
      Parameters:
      id - an id of object that are going to be updated
      name - new name value for gift certificate
      description - new description value for gift certificate
      duration - new duration value for gift certificate
      price - new price value for gift certificate
      Returns:
      object that was updated in DB
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.updateGiftCertificateBySomeFields(Long, String, String, BigDecimal, Integer)

    • deleteGiftCertificate

      @DeleteMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteGiftCertificate(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Controller DELETE method that delete a gift certificate by id, by calling a method of service layer.
      Parameters:
      id - an id of object that are going to be deleted
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateService.deleteGiftCertificate(Long)
